settings.content: This section can feature 3 images that can link to any content in the shop.
Display links to featured collections based on a menu of collection links.
Display a collection of featured products in the standard column grid layout.
Feature a single product or collection of products in full detail to purchase directly from the home page.
Display recent blog articles on the home page. When editing your blog articles, you can 'add an excerpt'. Any text or images inserted into the excerpt will be displayed on your home page.
Display Twitter and Instagram timeline profile feeds.
For best results, upload images that are around 1280px in width and under 600px in height. Try to keep your slideshow images the same size.

settings.label: Stretch Slideshow to Full Screen Width

settings.label: Shipping Rates Calculator default country selection

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: [DISQUS](http://disqus.com/) Comments Enabled (instead of Shopify's default comments)
Display Social Icons?
settings.info: The various social profiles are added in the Header section.

settings.content: To enable this feature, you must first edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/Do_Tell_Where_The_Money_Is) (Do tell where the money is).
Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.
Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. [Complete list of currency codes](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Example: CAD USD.
To test this feature, set the number of days until the popup is displayed again to 0.

settings.label: Days until Popup is Displayed Again

settings.content: The [Password Page](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/2114099-password-page) is a landing page for your customers to view while you are still perfecting your store. You can leave your customers a message, links to your social media, give them the option to subscribe to your mailing list.
